thumbnails.description: using Thumbnails in playlist or not (alias for playlistThumbnails)

thumbs.description: using Thumbnails in playlist or not (alias for playlistThumbnails)

download.description: Set this to true to show a download button in the player controlbar

playlistthumbnails.description: using Thumbnails in playlist or not

group.description: if multiple video are defined, you have to define if this videos should be break a part or played as a single video

overstretch.description: Sets how to stretch images/movies to make them fit the display. Set this to true to stretch them proportionally to fill the display, fit to stretch them disproportionally and none to keep original dimensions

passthrough.description: attribute to pass natively vales to player

preview.description: set this to the path of a preview image.

playlistsize.description: size of the playlist, if playlist is right of display this is the width otherwise the height

playlist.description: define if and where the playlist will be displayed

autostart.description: Set this to true in the player to automatically start playing when the page loads
